lines.text: The stuff to the right, the things to the left.
Hey, Lillebror. I don't suppose you've got any caramels left?
Hmm. That's three. But you can't split three. Any kid knows that
No? You greedy little kid. Won't you even let me have a tiny fudge?
Yeah, but now there's only two left. Who'll get to choose first?
You may. But only if you take the smallest one.
Then you'll get to choose first.
. But now you took the biggest one.
Yeah. Which one would you have picked if you'd choose first?
Well, now you've got the smallest one. What's the problem?
Welcome in, my dearest Karlsson. And you too, by the way.
